pages.text: The Basalz is a mob that spawns in barren or mountainous biomes. It has 10 hearts and deals 4.0 hearts of damage at close range. It shoots projectiles which deal 3.5 hearts of damage and apply the Sundered effect. It has a chance to drop Basalz Shards, which can be crafted or pulverized into Basalz Powder.
pages.title: Basalz

pages.text: Sundered: Decreases the efficacy of armor by 25% per level.
